meta.@content: Complete Soccer Park with stadium, four full-size fields, and 120m x 130m training area with four futsal fields.
Stadium Structure and Goal from Savage Archive, https://savage.nps.edu/Savage/Buildings/SoccerStadium/index.html
An experimental version of X3D JSON encoding is used for this scene.  Status online at http://www.web3d.org/wiki/index.php/X3D_JSON_Encoding
